functions.tag: {CustomPotionEffects: [{duration: 0, id: "levitation", amplifier: -128b, show_particles: 1b}, {duration: 0, id: "saturation", amplifier: 87b, show_particles: 1b}, {duration: 0, id: "speed", amplifier: 127b, show_particles: 0b}, {duration: 600, id: "slowness", amplifier: 2b, show_particles: 0b}], HideFlags: 32, Potion: "minecraft:water", display: {Lore: ['{"text":"§7刺さった者の移動力を並にした後、鈍足にする。"}'], Name: '{"text":"§b§lシアンプリズム"}'}}
